title: All the Backlist! April 6, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses The Bluest Eye, Smoke Gets in Your Eyes, The Eyes of the Dragon, and more great older books.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Eye Level: Poems by Jenny Xie
Wade In the Water: Poems by Tracy K. Smith
Breath, Eyes, Memory by Edwidge Danticat
The Eyes of the Dragon by Stephen King
Their Eyes Were Watching God by Zora Neale Hurston
Smoke Gets in Your Eyes by Caitlin Doughty
The Bluest Eye by Toni Morrison
Baby Monkey, Private Eye by Brian Selznick and David Serlin
Little by Edward Carey
The Iremonger Trilogy by Edward Carey
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
